what_to_do: Wake up naturally, stretch, and enjoy the morning sunlight filtering through the curtains. A few moments of quiet contemplation and a quick check of weather forecast for potential photo opportunities.
Prepare a simple breakfast – probably some yogurt with granola and fresh berries. Enjoy it on the balcony, listening to the birds and planning the day's photographic adventures.

Review yesterday's photos (April 19th) and do some light editing using Lightroom.  Focus on color correction and cropping.  Also, research potential locations for today's shoot – maybe a local park with cherry blossoms or a charming cafe.
Pack camera gear: camera body, two lenses (50mm and 35mm), extra batteries, memory cards, and a small tripod.  Also, grab a reusable water bottle and a small notebook for jotting down ideas.
interaction_target: Camera bag, camera, lenses, tripod, notebook

what_to_do: Head to the local park (likely Sakura Park) for a morning photography session. Focus on capturing the cherry blossoms in soft morning light. Experiment with different angles and compositions. Take breaks to simply observe and daydream.
Lunch at a cute cafe near the park.  Something light and refreshing – maybe a salad or a pastry.  People-watching and sketching in my notebook.
Explore a different area of the park, focusing on details – textures, patterns, and interesting light.  Try some black and white photography.
Return home.  Unpack camera gear and have a cup of herbal tea while reviewing the day's photos on the camera's LCD screen.

More detailed photo editing.  This time, I'll focus on a smaller selection of images, really refining the colors and tones.  Also, I'll upload a few of my favorites to Instagram with thoughtful captions.
Prepare a simple dinner – probably pasta with pesto. Listen to some relaxing music while cooking.
Enjoy dinner on the balcony, watching the sunset.  Reflect on the day and make a few notes in my journal.
Read a book – something light and inspiring.  Maybe a photography book or a collection of poetry.
Gentle stretching and skincare routine.  Prepare for a restful sleep.
Sleep. Dream of beautiful light and captivating moments.
